name: 100 hidden cats 2
description:
Art by Аnatoliy Loginovskikh


Important information
  • Press "N" for night mode.
  • Press "Del" then "Esc" to reset all achievements.

100 hidden cats 2 is a hidden object game in the city setting.
Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style.
Ultra hard! Really very difficult!

Cunning cats hid in the big city.
They are disguised and very dangerous.
Can you find 100 cats? Just click on the cat!
Take care of your nerves!
